post.body: Yep, but so true; annoying people annoy me; I'm always worried about annoying others which is annoying 2 me-I bother myself the most
Like this one :)
Signed up :)
Yep, Yeah but working out is makin bacon which should warm u up and make u look great!
1st thought "Oh Please!" Of course it's store bought; I don't have the time 2b fabulous and bake. Just remove from tin 1st ;)
I guess I know what I'm doing tonight ;)
Me too; I'm finding good information here
Good for you; a little extra $$ is nice around now, huh? :)
I love men 2, thu sometimes It seems it would be easier, but no; not from exprience - just seeing what my friends have gone thru
Great video!
This is why Linda has the great rep that she does; she's constantly impoving herself; Considering RE? Check her out-Raliegh, NC
but you'd just add twice as many things 2 the To-Do list; like needing things you can't possibly live without, but have been
Great Advice!
100lbs? OMG, that's great! Do U have a tip or 2 or 3 to share? R U working out, starving urself; what?
Person to know! Thanks 4 ur help. It's going to be a Happy Freakin New Year 4 us as we get America Healthy 1 body at a time:)
I try to wear red lipstick when ever I can :)
I don't run, but I do rebound my little heart out ;)
It's amazing how many people have it, it's like lupus, so many degree of it
My goal 4 2009 is 2 find out & deliver more of what my clients r looking 4 vs. me giving them what I have 2 offer
I love watching informercials; I always pick up another tip that I didn't notice the first 500 times I watched them :)
Today is my birthday; the 2nd best day of the year 2 make resoultions/goals. Better 2 set ur own goals; than have someone else do it 4 you
loving http://www.twittermoms.com -- check it out! The members are really nice; feels like community :)
Back, hip & knee pains? 1lb of excess weight = 4lbs on the joints; better 2 lose the weight now vs a joint replacement later, like my mom :(
Want to save $$ and lose weight? Use a lunch box; put only the foods ur going 2 eat that day and stick 2 it; It's a habit worth developing
Cold? May be due 2 poor circulation; Put on some music and dance - Just 3 songs is all it takes to move the blood & help 2 lose that weight!
Looking 4 a healthy meal? A handful of almonds w/water is about 130 cals., nutritious, filling, & cheap-b careful though, just 1 hand not 2!
Walking the strip in Las Vegas is quite a workout! Leave car at the hotel & use public transpt. Avoid parking fees and forces you to walk.
Dieting in Las Vegas not easy, but can be cheap; hit the buffets and load up on salad & veggies; dressing on side; ask for water w/lemon
bSlim2 Just arrived in Vegas; wished i I had packed a lunch box 4 US Air flight-not much 2 choose & very expensive
It is better & far more rewarding 2 give than receive. Go thru ur abundance and donate the excess. Give w/love what u would enjoy receiving
Planning 2 lose weight? Exchange clothing gifts for smaller sizes; Will give u more incentive 2 achieve ur goal & have clothing 2 wear later
Take time 2 enjoy the little moments that make a happy life. There r good times all around us. Slow down & you'll notice them. Merry Xmas :)
Flying standby? Avoid stress - re-check ur baggage route 2 make sure they're following; I didn't & now 3 bags lost via US Air, Philly PA.
Gift shopping? Don't spend 2 much-it really is the thought that counts. Most people don't remember who gave them what from last year, do u?
Watch ur bag/wallet! almost lost mine 2 a pair of pickpockets in Walmart- Las Vegas. They work as teams 1 distracts, the other picks.
Adding water 2 those syrap filled drinks like SunnyD will sneak out the calories 4 the little ones-until u can get them of that crap 4 good
